thread.section_title: PureFormulas Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PureFormulas | www.pureformulas.com
thread.title: Education.com Member

author: Education.com Member
title: Education.com Member
text: I was very excited to stumble upon this website. I was looking to purchase PRL supplements and this is the only online company that I could find to give a discount and also points back! My order came quickly and was packaged very well. I'm impressed with Pure Formulas and will be purchasing from them in the future. Would recommend them to anyone!
